tool_description: Creates and manages Kubernetes secrets for sensitive data like passwords, tokens, and certificates.

secret_name.description: Name of the secret to create

namespace.description: Namespace where secret will be created

kubeconfig.description: Base64 encoded kubeconfig for cluster access

secret_type.description: Type of secret: generic, tls, docker-registry

error_messages: Invalid secret name: Must follow Kubernetes naming conventions.
Namespace not found: Specified namespace does not exist.
Kubeconfig authentication failed: Verify kubeconfig credentials.
Invalid secret type: Use one of [generic, tls, docker-registry].
Data mismatch: data_keys and data_values arrays must have same length.
Invalid base64 encoding: Ensure data_values are properly base64 encoded.
usage: Provide secret_name, namespace, kubeconfig, secret_type, data_keys, and data_values. Creates the secret and returns status.

data_key_count.description: Number of data keys stored in secret
